embed.description: We'd like to do a similar feature one day where if a player fails to connect to the game in the first X minutes, the rest of the players can simply reset the match with no penalties.

replies.body: Why would i let the enemy team leave without penalty in ranked?
I think if you go AFK you should have a valid reason why
Failing to connect is actually different from leaving, so yeah, should be doable without creating issues.
